attributes.action: Request immediate resignation of any MP with false expense claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people are appalled that many MP's have been less than morally upstanding, following the recent (and ongoing) 'misuse' of expenses and allowances system.

Rather than let any MP take the easy option of 'standing down' at the next election, They should be removed from their post IMMEDIATELY, and a bi-election held asap - this is the only way to enable honest, trustworthy candidates to take their place.

Allowing MP's to continue in office when they have lost the trust and hrespect of their constituents is disgraceful.

In any other employment, they would no doubt have been denied their claims, or dismissed.

rejection.details: Petitions to the Number 10 site must request an action that can be taken by the PM or Government. Government does not control who sits in Parliament and cannot force MPs of other parties to resign. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament or with the relevant political parties.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
